description: Signals that the player has finalized their action choice for the current turn by submitting it from the UI. The payload now uses an integer index instead of a string actionId.

submittedByActorId.description: The instance ID of the actor who submitted this turn.

chosenIndex.description: The 1-based index of the action composite chosen by the player from the available list.

speech.description: The text from the speech input field, or null if not provided.
